name: Late Night Drive
description:
Late Night Drive is a captivating and relaxing game that puts you behind the wheel of a car, exploring the city streets in the dead of night. With its assortment of diverse maps and three unique game modes - Free Mode, Time Mode, and Bomb Mode - this game offers an unparalleled driving experience that will leave you exhilarated.

In Online Mode, You can go on a relaxing journey with your friends.(online mode supports up to 4 people)

In Free Mode, players are granted complete freedom to navigate the expansive cityscape at their own pace. Whether you want to take a leisurely drive along the picturesque coastline or cruise through the bustling urban streets, the choice is yours. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric ambience of the late-night city, where the glowing lights and calm surroundings create the perfect setting for a soothing and relaxing driving experience.

For those seeking a bit of a challenge, Time Mode adds a thrilling element of competition. With a limited time of 60 seconds, you'll need to push your driving skills to the limit as you strive to cover the maximum distance possible.

If you crave an adrenaline rush and a test of your reflexes, Bomb Mode is the ultimate choice. Here, you must maintain a speed of at least 50km/h to prevent a bomb in your car from exploding. Maneuver through traffic with precision, avoiding collisions and maintaining your speed to stay alive. The tension rises as the timer ticks down, providing an intense and heart-pounding experience.

Late Night Drive combines stunning visuals and smooth controls to deliver a captivating driving adventure. Whether you prefer a leisurely cruise or a pulse-pounding challenge, this game caters to all driving enthusiasts. So, buckle up, turn on the headlights, and embark on an unforgettable journey through the enchanting late-night city.

Note: Late Night Drive is not a racing game but rather an relaxing driving experience that allows players to enjoy the serene and peaceful aspects of driving at night.
